title: CryptoGirl.y
author: CryptoGirl.y
content: We are seeking a knowledgeable consultant to facilitate comprehensive advice and elucidate subtle details crucial to the successful creation of a fork of RavenCoin (https://github.com/RavenProject/Ravencoin/). Alternatively, we would consider expertise with any other coin utilizing a GPU-mining algorithm.This is a paid position. We encourage interested to submit their fee structures for consultation services, or alternatively, for the complete process of creating the fork itself.
